w21z39pt8t.name: Ahmad Mosque
w21z39pt8t.remarks: Originally a typical kampung mosque built in 1934 on a piece of land given by a Mr Ahmat Yahya, the mosque has been redeveloped with better facilities.   Located in the Central part of the island, the masjid serves the residents and workers around the area

w21z3w65bk.name: Singapore Polytechnic, T21
w21z3w65bk.remarks: Musolla is within view of the basement study corner.

w21z3ket7p.directions: EA Engineering - Proceed to Level 7 staircase landing near cafe.
w21z3ket7p.name: EA Engineering, NUS

w21z37sjrv.address: 10 Kent Ridge Crescent, Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences (S), 119260
w21z37sjrv.directions: FASS AS4 "Deck" Canteen - From Muslim Stall1, walk straight, turn left and enter the door next to the handicapped toilet. Walk straight, on your left is "Centre of Language Studies". Turn right and enter the door (near to female toilet) to lift. Go to level 6. Turn right; enter the door to staircase A.
w21z37sjrv.name: AS4 Arts and Social Science, NUS

w21z3ks609.directions: E3 Engineering - Proceed to Level 6 staircase landing near male toilet.
w21z3ks609.name: E3 Engineering, NUS

w21z3kkc80.directions: E5 Engineering - Proceed to Level 4 staircase landing near elevator on E5 side.
w21z3kkc80.name: E5 Engineering, NUS

w21z3k77f0.address: 4 Architecture Drive, School of Design & Environment (S), 117566
w21z3k77f0.directions: Architecture (SDE3) - Alight from SDE bus stop. Walk towards Centre For English Language Communication building. Pass it and keep walking along the pavement until you pass a bookshop on your left. Walk straight and turn right, take the lift and go to level 4. Turn right, walk pass the lecture room and turn right when you see staircase, go up and turn left. Female toilet is opposite LR422. Male toilet is opposite LR427. Musolla is at the staircase landing near to the female toilet.
w21z3k77f0.name: SDE3 Design and Environment, NUS

w21z3s4sf2.address: S16 Science Drive 2, Faculty of Science 6 (S), 117546
w21z3s4sf2.directions: S15 Science - Alight at the Science bus stop. Walk towards S16. Turn to the left and walk towards S15. Take the lift to the 6th floor. Climb the stairs to the musolla.
w21z3s4sf2.name: S15 Science, NUS

w21z3eg0gc.address: 10 Kent Ridge Crescent, Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences (S), 119260
w21z3eg0gc.directions: AS6 FASS - Alight at the Central Library bus stop. Climb the stairs to the library. Turn to the right and walk down the walkway towards AS6. Turn to the left and enter AS6 glass door. Walk all the way to the exit door at the opposite end. Take the lift to level 5. Exit through the exit door to the staircase landing.
w21z3eg0gc.name: AS6 Arts and Social Science, NUS

w21z3k6mfj.name: Tentera Di Raja Mosque
w21z3k6mfj.remarks: Built in 1961 by Muslim members of the British army, this old generation masjid was renamed Tentera Di Raja in recognition of their contributions. Located in the West and close to the National University of Singapore, it is distinguished by its minaret topped by a gold-painted dome. With a capacity of 1000 people, its newly-set up Youth Wing whose members are mostly undergraduates has recently embarked on a tuition scheme called EMAS (English, Maths and Science) for primary six children.

w21z3fz13s.name: Hang Jebat Mosque
w21z3fz13s.remarks: From a small surau, this old generation masjid has grown into what it is today. Built in 1952, this zinc-roofed masjid underwent major renovations in 1996 to expand on its prayer hall. Today it can accommodate 600 worshippers. Located in the Central part of the island, the masjid offers weekend madrasah classes to students living around Queenstown area. It also organizes zikir sessions where praises to Allah are recited.

w21z3s4xe1.address: S16 Science Drive 2, Faculty of Science 6 (S), 117546
w21z3s4xe1.directions: S17 Department of Mathematics - Alight at the Science bus stop. Cross over to the department of Mathematics. Take the lift to the 4th floor. Exit the lift area, turn to the left and walk towards the Exit door. Enter the Exit door and climb the stairs to the musolla.
w21z3s4xe1.name: S17 Science, NUS

w21z3kqsb6.directions: YIH - Take A1 from Kent Ridge MRT. Alight at YIH bus stop. Climb the stairs towards Student Service Centre to level 3.
w21z3kqsb6.name: YIH, NUS

w21z3mtkk7.directions: Utown - Take D1 from Kent Ridge MRT. Alight at UTown bus stop. Walk towards Education Resource Centre (ERC). Go to the 2nd floor. Go towards the exit/toilet. Enter the Exit door (stairs 3).
w21z3mtkk7.name: Utown, NUS

w21z3kj09p.directions: Central Forum FASS - Alight at the Central Library bus stop. Climb the stairs to the library. Turn to the right to the book drop. Go down the narrow stairs beside the book drop. The musolla is halfway between the 1st and 2nd floor.
w21z3kj09p.name: Central Forum FASS, NUS

w21z375fmt.name: Hussein Sulaiman Mosque
w21z375fmt.remarks: This old generation masjid which started as a village surau was built way back in 1902. Today, it retains much of its original architecture. Located in the Central part of the island, it occupies an area of 422 sq metre and has a capacity of 300 people. Activities are confined to daily and Friday prayers with occasional religious lectures.

w21z3scdn9.name: B2 @ SIT Dover
w21z3scdn9.directions: From The Canopy (main food court), turn right at the toilet and walk along the corridor to the next toilet. The musolla is under the staircase, beside the male toilet.
w21z3scdn9.provision: Slippers, Praying Mats, Telekung, Qiblat Indicator, Quran, Fans
w21z3scdn9.remarks: If the musolla is fully occupied, you can pray at the turfed open area on mezzanine level, a few steps up outside the musolla.

w21z3vbkmm.name: Star Vista
w21z3vbkmm.address: The Star Vista, #01-03, 1 Vista Exchange Green, Singapore 138617
w21z3vbkmm.directions: Smoke stop lobby. Beside lift lobby.

w21z37vb6y.name: COM1
w21z37vb6y.address: NUS School of Computing, COM1, 13 Computing Drive, Singapore 117417
w21z37vb6y.directions: Near Makers@SOC, go up the staircase to fourth floor

w21z3y6v7f.name: Civil Service College near carpark
w21z3y6v7f.directions: After exiting from the main entrance, turn to your right and walk towards the direction of the carpark of the building. Turn right when you see a bicycle stand. Walk to the end. The door to the Musollah is on your right.
w21z3y6v7f.provision: Slippers, Praying Mats, Telekung, Qiblat Indicator, Fans
